document.full_text: any hope pedro feliciano held of being available for opening day vanished sunday, when continued tightness in his left triceps forced him to abort a scheduled throwing session.
document.title: feliciano is still ailing, so yankees make other plans
lines_and_colors: any hope pedro feliciano held of being available for opening day vanished sunday, when continued tightness in his left triceps forced him to abort a scheduled throwing session.
